about_the_game:
Unlock Tiara from Fairy Fencer F as a playable character in Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart! Play through the new scenario [Defeat Tiara!] to add her into your party!

After purchase of this pack, reach either of the criteria below to unlock the new scenario:
*If loading a saved game, proceed to the next chapter.
*If starting a new game, proceed to Chapter 2.
*If starting a cleared game save, proceed to Chapter 2.
detailed_description:
Unlock Tiara from Fairy Fencer F as a playable character in Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart! Play through the new scenario [Defeat Tiara!] to add her into your party!

After purchase of this pack, reach either of the criteria below to unlock the new scenario:
*If loading a saved game, proceed to the next chapter.
*If starting a new game, proceed to Chapter 2.
*If starting a cleared game save, proceed to Chapter 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32bit, 64bit)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series

short_description: Unlock Tiara from Fairy Fencer F as a playable character in Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart!
